channel.title: Zoom rsps V2 | 317 Allstar
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]ZOOM RSPS[/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]VIDEOS:[/size]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=enu5FdVH5co[/youtube]

[size=24pt]THINGS I'VE ADDED/SOME FEAUTURES[/size] Fixed Starter. Fixed Drops. Fixed dropping items (all players can see it) Removed Stupid Commands. Fixed Drop rates. Fixed all nulls. Added Commands. Changed Home. Removed Log in screen. Fixed Cheat clients. Fixed most dupes. Fixed Spell Books. Changed the client a lot. Fixed killing shop ncps, ect. New items. Fixed reset hp on death Re-did all shops Almost full Dragon Claws Donator Presents Crystal Key chest (being worked on) 100% Full godsword stances. New Thieving at home. A bunch of useful commands added. Working Checks. New money making ways. Fixed Seeds Added Extended graphics list Added Extended emote list Added new emote system Added godwars bosses Dicing Mithril seeds [size=18pt][color=red]---New---[/color][/size] New skilling area Fixed fences Fixed D Mace No more rainbow partyhat All Fully Working Prayers New donator zone New donator benefits 1 click pick up Donator Bank book Donator System Working Ladders PVP :D REMOVED NEW ITEMS New commands
[size=24pt]PICTURES:[/size]
Join Now!
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/29470ya.png[/img]
Fixed Fences (:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/308xlld.png[/img]
Donator Bank (If you click it your bank opens) When you die it doesn't drop and only donators can open it. (This doesn't give you items, it only opens your bank.)
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/30xagq9.png[/img]
Part of ::mms (Moneymaking/skills

[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/3466oad.png[/img]
Thieving at home!
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/23ifq7m.png[/img]
Awesome shop - DELETED NEWER ITEMS. (:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ef5bly.png[/img]
Buy all shop with 2B checks and mith seeds
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/34fbst4.png[/img]
FULL GS STANCES
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/25t9nv5.png[/img]
